::Battera::

She walked closer to the Cybertron fire and went out into the open.  
She looked around and still saw no one around.
"I wonder if the place is deserted?"
She walked closer and noticed the autoguns weren't firing on her.  
She walked up to the entrance of the ship.  She called  out and heard 
her voice echo in the halls. "HELLOOOO? Is anyone there? I came to 
talk. Is anyone here?"
She hoped that the bot that answerd would be friendly.
